nodes.text: General Lok Durd brought a Sheathipede-class transport shuttle with his forces to Maridun during the Clone Wars. Left at Durd's base while he and his forces left to test his Defoliator weapon on a village of Lurmen colonists, the shuttle was subsequently stolen by a small group of Galactic Republic soldiers stranded on the planet who were aware of Durd's presence and intended to stop him.
